column5: <object width="425" height="366"><param name="movie" value="   Shocking!...  Gerritt.
Oh man...I'm hungry now....LOL  Pretty scary..gonna eat at Mcdonalds more often!
WOW and here I was proud that this Xmas will be the three year mark for me not eating Mcd's maybe I will have to start again.

how can you guys not eat mcdonalds??????? ITS MONOPOLY TIME BABY!!!!!!!!.....or it was.......i think it ends soon....anyways i was eatin a big mac combo supersized each day.......and I won nadda.....but advertising works
Give me the pasta anyday  Plus I've never heard of anyone drinking red wine with a big mac.  Cheers!

"Did you see the size of those meatballs? Those alone would account for the high caloric intake."  Yeah the meatballs were quarter pounders. LOL  If I listened to health Canada "drink 8 cups of water every day" I'd never be hungry cause i'd be so bloated with water, and I'd get so much exercise running back and fourth to the washroom. LOL  I think I rather have a heart attack anyways, better than spending the last 10 years of your life in diapers, in a home, depending on everyone else to take care of you.

AAHHHHHHH !!!!!!!!  So thats why im gettin FAT....  . i dont hardly eat take-out fast food....but man i sure like spagetti & pasta , we eat pasta at least 2 times a week....man thats depressing     well at least it tastes good  LOL..LOL..LOL thanks gerritt,for making me cry......cheers
Ya.  Deano, the question is, would you rather die quickly at 45 or take your time at 82?
Doug, stress is the number one killer, so if your worried about what ya eat, I'm already gonna out live you. LOL
portion sizes in the US are just crazy.  everything in moderation  i'll stick to nonna's homemade pasta...mmm...

Mmmmmmmmmmmm. I could go for some of that heart attack on a plate along with that slice of cheesecake & those Olive Garden bread sticks.  Me + McDonalds = Me sitting on the toilet for long periods of time & naps in between toilet breaks.
no pasta is depressing lol  oh well im in decent shape and i eat it lol  CHeers!
What the heck is in that pasta??
i'd take any pasta over McD's anyday, dats a one a bigg a meat a ball
